title: Platform Engineering for a Mainframe: Design Thinking Drives Change
author: Jennifer Riggins
description: Engineers from Legal & General take us inside Project Impala, an effort to transform the mainframe developer experience to deliver higher quality faster.
cntitle: 大型机平台工程：设计思维推动变革
cndescription: 法律与通用工程师带我们了解 Project Impala，这是一项旨在改变大型机开发人员体验以更快地交付更高质量的努力。
